General.Name: ASolid Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: ASolid Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a NAND flash controller provider in Taiwan. It offers SD/microSD controllers, USB flash drive controllers, eMMC controllers, and SSD and UFD controllers. ASolid Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 83, Gongdao 5th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
